title: When is Gragas being gutted?
body: I cannot take this shit, he builds no AP items, still 100/0's the ADC, you cant kite him as he's unkillable, wtf.

replies.body: BV sixth item. Prey for peel, kite.

he's like rammus, you need someone (like the tank) to block his body slam, then he won't be able to stun you and land his w. So make sure you are always putting someone between you and gragas (even if it's your ap mid) because if you don't then you will take alot of damage.

he is strong but very easy to predict.

most things can kill ADC's, we are called glass cannons for a reason.


i see you only play blinds so you'll have to learn to expect him, as most people are practicing him in norms
